attributes.action: urge The Speaker to allow MP's of all parties at PM's Question Time to raise questions instead of letting it be dominated by Members of his own party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that any preference towards the Governing Party's own MP's to be allowed to raise the majority of questions at PMQ should be removed, and Members questions apportioned more fairly according to the proportion of seats their party holds in the House of Commons

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
